name: Duplicate Familiar
components: V, S, M (alchemically preserved mockingfey feathers), F (familiar)
text: You create a duplicate of a familiar. The familiar’s master can use the duplicate as if it were his familiar in all respects, though he doesn’t gain the bonus special ability from more than one familiar at a time. When the spell’s duration expires, the familiar duplicate shrivels into nothing, even if petrified or otherwise transformed.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（经过防腐处理的妖精羽毛），器材（魔宠）
effect_zh: 接触到的魔宠的临时复制品
text_zh: 你创造出魔宠的复制品。魔宠的主人能够在所有方面将复制品当做自己的魔宠一般使用，不过他在同一时间不能从1只以上个魔宠处获得特殊奖励。在法术的持续时间结束后，魔宠复制品便会化为虚无，即便被石化（petrified）或者以其他方式转化过也是如此。
